item.description:
Please join me on the Charles in Cambridge for a slow-paced, 4 mile run.

We did this back and June and kept a 10.7 minute mile.

We will start at the Boston side of the Harvard Bridge, at the bottom of the walking ramp. We'll then head west and cross at River Street and return to the starting point.

Faster runners are welcome to join us!!!

You can check out a map of the route here: http://www.mapmyfitne...

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I'll send my cell number out on Sunday to make sure you can find me.

Andy

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Slower Runners Sunday Evening Run On The Charles
